content: Guest {{userName}} will be moved to the {{membersSection}} section and assigned the User type. Users have their own {{documentsSection}} section, are able to create and edit files, but aren't able to create rooms.

comment.text: This translation key is used in a dialog to display a message informing users about changes made to their user type. The message explains how the change affects their access to features like file creation and room management. It appears in the /packages/client/src/components/dialogs/ChangeUserTypeDialog component, likely on a button or confirmation action.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'تعيينه كنوع مستخدم' is a literal translation of 'assigned the User type'. A more natural Arabic phrasing would be 'وسيتم تعيين نوع المستخدم له' or 'وسيتم تصنيفه كمستخدم'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: وسيتم تعيين نوع المستخدم له

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'يمكن للمستخدمين الوصول إلى قسم...الخاص بهم' is slightly awkward.  While technically correct, a more elegant phrasing would be more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يتمتع المستخدمون بقسم...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "İstifadəçi növü təyin ediləcək" is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "İstifadəçi statusuna malik olacaq" or "İstifadəçi statusuna keçiriləcək".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Qonaq {{userName}} {{membersSection}} bölməsinə köçürüləcək və İstifadəçi statusuna malik olacaq/keçiriləcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "faylları yarada və redaktə edə biləcəkləri öz {{documentsSection}} bölməsi mövcuddur" is a bit verbose and clunky. It could be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Özlərinin {{documentsSection}} bölmələri olacaq, faylları yaraya və redaktə edə biləcəklər.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'will be assigned the User type' is a literal translation and sounds awkward. A more natural Bulgarian phrasing would be 'ще получи потребителски тип'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ще получи потребителски тип

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Host' is a less accurate translation of 'Guest' in this context. 'Guest' refers to a user who hasn't been upgraded to a full member. A better translation would be something along the lines of 'Návštěvník' or 'Sguest'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Návštěvník' or 'Sguest' instead of 'Host'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'bude mu přiřazen typ Uživatel' is slightly awkward.  It literally translates to 'will be assigned the User type'.  It would read more naturally as 'bude mít typ Uživatel'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'bude mu přiřazen typ Uživatel' to 'bude mít typ Uživatel'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'assigned the User type' is translated as 'dem Benutzertyp "User" zugewiesen'. It's more natural to use a definite article and a slightly different phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: dem Benutzertyp zugewiesen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'documentsSection' is not appropriately translated. It should be 'Dokumentenbereich' instead of a literal translation with 'bereich'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dokumentenbereich

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of quotation marks around '{{membersSection}}' is inconsistent with English and potentially confusing. Removing the quotes would enhance readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The German translation should remove the quotes around "{{membersSection}}".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation does not maintain the bold formatting of the original English content for `{{userName}}`. While the HTML tags are present, it's important to ensure consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure that the `<strong>` tags are correctly rendered in the display context, so `{{userName}}` appears bolded.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Spanish translation maintains the double curly braces `{{...}}` around the variables, similar to the English. While not inherently wrong, it's best practice to remove these in the translated text unless they are part of the user interface rendering. This would make the translated string cleaner for display.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the double curly braces around the variables, e.g., change `{{documentsSection}}` to `documentsSection`.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "hänelle osoitetaan käyttäjätyyppi" is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "saat käyttäjätyypin" or "muutetaan käyttäjätyypiksi".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vieras {{userName}} siirretään {{membersSection}}-osioon ja hän saa käyttäjätyypin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "se verra attribuer" is a bit formal and less natural in this context. A more common and direct translation would be "aura".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: L'invité {{userName}} sera déplacé dans la section {{membersSection}} et aura le type Utilisateur.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There's a space missing after the comma before 'peuvent'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: L'invité {{userName}} sera déplacé dans la section {{membersSection}} et aura le type Utilisateur. Les utilisateurs ont leur propre section {{documentsSection}}, peuvent créer et modifier des fichiers, mais ne peuvent pas créer de salles.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word for 'files' is misspelled. 'ֆայլեր' should be 'ֆայլեր'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ֆայլեր

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'չեն կարողանում ստեղծել սենյակներ' could be improved for flow. It translates literally as 'aren't able to create rooms', but sounds slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might be 'չեն կարող ստեղծել սենյակներ'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: չեն կարող ստեղծել սենյակներ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'gli verrà assegnato il tipo Utente' sounds slightly awkward in Italian. A more natural phrasing would be 'gli sarà assegnato il tipo Utente' or 'riceverà il tipo Utente'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: riceverà il tipo Utente

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "사용자 유형이 할당됩니다" (user type is assigned) is a bit clunky and doesn't quite capture the nuance of the English "assigned the User type". A more natural phrasing would be "사용자 유형으로 변경됩니다" (changed to User type).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 사용자 유형으로 변경됩니다

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'แขກຮັບເຊີນ' (kaek rap chein) translates to 'invited guest' which isn't the best equivalent for 'Guest' in this context. It implies a more formal invitation. A more neutral term like 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ຊາແບກ' (phu sai cha baek) - 'user' or 'guest user' might be better, or simply 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້' (phu sai) could suffice depending on the overall tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້' (phu sai) or 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ຊາແບກ' (phu sai cha baek) instead of 'แขກຮັບເຊີນ' (kaek rap chein).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ຖືກມອບຫມາຍເປັນປະເພດຜູ້ໃຊ້' could be more naturally expressed.  It's a bit literal. A better translation might focus on the change in user type.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ຈະຖືກປ່ຽນເປັນປະເພດຜູ້ໃຊ້' (ja thuk pian pen pra-phet phu sai) - 'will be changed to user type'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of strong tags seems to be maintained correctly. No issues here.

The Latvian translation of 'User type' is 'veids Lietotājs'.  'veids' means 'type' or 'kind', but it's grammatically awkward in this context. A more natural translation would be 'Lietotāja tips' or simply 'Lietotājs'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lietotāja tips

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'tiks piešķirts veids Lietotājs' is grammatically awkward. It would be more idiomatic to use a phrasing like 'tiks piešķirts Lietotāja tips' or 'būs Lietotājs'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: būs Lietotājs

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation maintains the strong tag around {{userName}}, which is correct. However, consistent formatting should be applied across all similar elements.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent use of strong tags for similar elements throughout the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'het type Gebruiker toegewezen' could be more natural. While grammatically correct, it sounds a little clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to 'het type Gebruiker' or 'de Gebruikersstatus'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Rodzaj użytkownika” is a literal translation of 'User type' which is not the most natural phrasing in Polish. A more appropriate translation would be 'Typ użytkownika' or 'Uprawnienia użytkownika'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Typ użytkownika

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'User type' is translated as 'tipo de utilizador'. While technically correct, it's more natural to say 'tipo de usuário' in Portuguese, particularly in a software context. 'Utilizador' is more common in European Portuguese, but 'usuário' is preferred in Brazilian Portuguese, which is the most common target audience for this type of application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: tipo de usuário

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Os utilizadors têm sua própria seção' contains a grammatical error. The plural form of 'utilizador' is 'utilizadores'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Os utilizadores têm sua própria seção

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'assigned the User type' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'receberá o tipo Usuário'. A more accurate translation would be 'terá o tipo Usuário' or 'receberá o tipo de Usuário'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: terá o tipo de Usuário

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a little awkward. While grammatically correct, the flow could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O convidado {{userName}} será movido para a seção {{membersSection}} e terá o tipo Usuário. Usuários têm sua própria seção {{documentsSection}}, podem criar e editar arquivos, mas não podem criar salas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'îi se va stabili' is grammatically awkward. It's not the most natural way to express 'will be assigned'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: va primi rolul de utilizator

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The article 'propria lor' is slightly redundant and sounds unnatural in this context. While technically correct, it could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: au secțiunea

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “dar nu pot crea săli” directly translates to 'but they can't create rooms'. A more accurate translation reflecting the original intent, which implies restriction, might be 'nu pot crea camere' or 'nu au permisiunea să creeze camere'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: dar nu au permisiunea să creeze camere

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'assigned the User type' is a bit awkward. A more natural translation for 'User type' would be 'тип Пользователя' or simply 'Пользователь'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Гость {{userName}} будет перемещен в раздел «{{membersSection}}», и ему будет назначен тип Пользователя.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of quotes around "Пользователь" is inconsistent with the rest of the text. It's better to maintain consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Гость {{userName}} будет перемещен в раздел «{{membersSection}}», и ему будет назначен тип Пользователя.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Muṟāṇḍu' (මුරණ්ඩු) is an unusual and potentially negative term for 'Guest'. It doesn't accurately convey the intended meaning. A more neutral term like 'හමුදෙනිසා' (Hamudeniisa - meaning 'guest' or 'visitor') or simply 'අමුත්තා' (Amuttā) would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'මුරණ්ඩු' (Muṟāṇḍu) with 'හමුදෙනිසා' (Hamudeniisa) or 'අමුත්තා' (Amuttā).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ෆයිල්ස් සාදා, සංස්කරණය කිරීමට හැකි' is a bit clunky. While understandable, a more natural phrasing is possible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ෆයිල්ස් සාදා, සංස්කරණය කිරීමට හැකි' with 'ෆයිල්ස් සාදා, වෙනස් කිරීමට හැකියාව ඇත' or 'ෆයිල්ස් සාදා, සංස්කරණය කරගත හැකිය'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'User type' is translated as 'typ Používateľ'. While technically correct, it's more natural and idiomatic to use 'užívateľský typ' in Slovak to convey 'User type'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hosť {{userName}} bude presunutý do sekcie {{membersSection}} a bude mu priradený užívateľský typ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "assigned to him" is implied in English and conveyed by "dodeljen mu bo". A more natural and precise translation would be "imel bo".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gost {{userName}} bo premaknjen v razdelek {{membersSection}} in imel bo tip uporabnika.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'are able to create and edit files' is a bit awkward.  A more natural Slovenian wording would be 'lahko ustvarjajo in urejajo datoteke'. While technically correct, the English phrasing is quite literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gost {{userName}} bo premaknjen v razdelek {{membersSection}} in imel bo tip uporabnika. Uporabniki imajo svoj razdelek za {{documentsSection}} in lahko ustvarjajo in urejajo datoteke, ne morejo pa ustvarjati sob.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'файлове' is a transliteration from Russian, not Serbian. It should be 'фајлове' (fajlove).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: фајлове

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian word for "rooms" is "собе", which is correct. However, the overall flow and phrasing feel somewhat unnatural in Serbian. While technically accurate, it could be improved for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Гост {{userName}} ће бити премештен у одељак {{membersSection}} и добиће тип Корисника. Корисници имају сопствени одељак за {{documentsSection}}, могу да креирају и уређују фајлове, али не могу да креирају собе.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses 'dobiće' which implies a future tense for receiving the user type. A more natural phrasing would be to simply state the user will *have* the user type.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gost {{userName}} će biti premešten u odeljak {{membersSection}} i imaće tip Korisnika.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The comma after '{{documentsSection}}' is unnecessary and disrupts the flow of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gost {{userName}} će biti premešten u odeljak {{membersSection}} i imaće tip Korisnika. Korisnici imaju sopstveni odeljak za {{documentsSection}} mogu kreirati i uređivati fajlove, ali ne mogu kreirati sobe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The quotation marks « » used for {{documentsSection}} are unusual in Turkish and don't match the surrounding text format.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use double quotes " or regular parentheses ( ).  For consistency with the English formatting (strong tags), using double quotes would be best.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'йому буде призначено тип «Користувач»' sounds a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'буде мати тип «Користувач»' or 'буде переведено на тип «Користувач»'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: буде мати тип «Користувач»

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "kiểu Người dùng" is a literal translation of "User type" and sounds unnatural in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would be "loại Người dùng" or simply "loại người dùng".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Khách {{userName}} sẽ được chuyển đến phần {{membersSection}} và được chỉ định loại Người dùng/loại người dùng.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Người dùng có phần {{documentsSection}} riêng có thể tạo và chỉnh sửa tập tin" is grammatically correct but could be improved for flow. "có phần...riêng" is a bit redundant. The verb 'tạo' could also be strengthened.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Người dùng có phần {{documentsSection}} riêng và có thể tạo và chỉnh sửa file/tài liệu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The double quotes around the section names ({{membersSection}} and {{documentsSection}}) are not consistently applied in the translation. The original English uses strong tags, the Chinese should consider aligning on consistent formatting (either all double quotes or no quotes).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider aligning the formatting of the placeholders to match the English version, or remove the double quotes entirely for consistency. For example, use "访客{{userName}}将被移动到{{membersSection}}部分，并分配为用户类型。用户拥有自己的{{documentsSection}}部分..."
